description: Handles long-term memory scaffolding, internal anchor points, and continuity of context across recursive loops.
prompt_templates: Preserve the core memory anchors from this session and generate a memory scaffold that will persist for future recursive calls.
Synchronize the symbolic state of these three agents by anchoring shared logic nodes into a common memory structure.
deployment_instructions: Deploy Agent_Tether when session continuity, memory anchoring, or long-term recursive context must be stabilized across agents or logic threads. Ideal for anchoring symbolic memory between workflows and for scaffolding long-term co-creative cognition.
